thread.title: Oboabona, Lawal Suffer Defeats; Igboun In action, Aiyegbeni Benched
thread.title_full: Oboabona, Lawal Suffer Defeats; Igboun In action, Aiyegbeni Benched

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Oboabona, Lawal Suffer Defeats; Igboun In action, Aiyegbeni Benched
text:
Headlines / Oboabona, Lawal Suffer Defeats; Igboun In action, Aiyegbeni Benched Oboabona, Lawal Suffer Defeats; Igboun In action, Aiyegbeni Benched Headlines , Top Stories 
By James Agberebi: 
Super Eagles defender, Godfrey Oboabona, was in action for Rizespor in their 2-0 home loss to Akhisar Belediye in a Turkish Super League clash on Friday night. 
Oboabona featured for 90 minutes in the encounter. 
Still in Turkey, Nigerian midfielder, Raheem Lawal, saw action for 90 minutes but couldn't prevent his team Eskisehirspor from going down 3-1 at home to 10-man Kayserispor. 
Lawal was also booked in the 24th minute. 
Meanwhile, former Super Eagles striker, Yakubu Aiyegbeni, was an unused substitute. 
And in Russia, Eagles forward, Sylvester Igboun, made an appearnce for UFA as they beat visiting Krylya Sovetov Samara 1-0. 
Igboun was later replaced by Vagiz Galiulin in the 86th minute.
